name: GoodMorningAnna
description: Private photos from friends and family to keep your browsing happy.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://api.forecast.io https://*.firebaseio.com ; object-src 'self' https://api.forecast.io https://*.firebaseio.com ; connect-src 'self' https://api.forecast.io wss://*.firebaseio.com
